channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Despite Catastrophic Hacks, Ransomware Payments Dropped Dramatically Last Year
item.description: Ransomware gangs continued to wreak havoc in 2024, but new research shows that the amounts victims paid these cybercriminals fell by hundreds of milli...

item.title: Therabody PowerDot 2.0 Duo Review: Can’t Connect to the App
item.description: Therabody’s at-home muscle stimulator is brilliant in theory but is plagued with connectivity issues.

item.title: The Best Greens Powders, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: We did the research (and taste-testing) for you to determine whether greens powders are worth your money, and if so, which ones.

item.title: Cherry Ventures raises a new $500M fund for early stage and beyond, but will it be enough?
item.description: It’s sometimes said that European VC doesn’t have the firepower to compete with VCs in the U.S., which regularly raise billion-dollar+ funds these day...

item.title: AI’s biggest stage awaits – TechCrunch Sessions: AI tickets available
item.description: AI is heating up, and we’re diving in! TechCrunch Sessions: AI is officially open for registration. Secure your spot now and save up to $300 on select...

item.title: The 8 Best Fans for Every Use, Editor Tested & Reviewed (2025)
item.description: From tower and pedestal styles to utilitarian box fans, these are our WIRED-tested favorites.

item.title: Musk moves to dismiss suit over Tesla’s alleged use of AI-generated ‘Blade Runner’ imagery
item.description: Attorneys for Elon Musk intend to move to dismiss a case that accuses the Tesla CEO, who is also the head of President Donald Trump’s DOGE organizatio...

item.title: How to Responsibly Dispose of Your Electronics (2025)
item.description: Get rid of old, broken, and unused devices—even Lightning cables—without adding to the e-waste problem.

item.title: Google launches new AI models and brings ‘thinking’ to Gemini
item.description: Google launched its much-anticipated new flagship AI model, Gemini 2.0 Pro Experimental, on Wednesday. The announcement was part of a series of other ...

item.title: Tickets on sale: TechCrunch All Stage 2025, formerly known as Early Stage
item.description: Founders and investors, it’s time! TechCrunch Early Stage has evolved into TechCrunch All Stage 2025, returning to Boston on July 17. Get your tickets...
